SEARCH
Package com.java.simonsobstaclecourse.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.java.simonsobstaclecourse.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game. Each player has a name, unique identifier, current position on the game board, required move value, and skip turn status.
Author:
Abhishek Wadmare, Lakshay Narula
